summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office staff regarding the Epstein case, specifically about a letter that the General Master did not receive and needs to be faxed. It indicates communication issues and urgency in handling case documents.

persons.name: General Master
persons.context: The General Master did not receive a copy of a letter and has been receiving calls about it; his assistant wants a copy faxed.

events.title: Communication about missing letter
events.description: Email correspondence indicates the General Master did not receive a copy of a letter and needs it faxed, showing urgency in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The General Master did not receive a copy of a letter related to the Epstein case and has been receiving calls about it.
The General Master's assistant requested that the letter be faxed to him.
The email chain shows urgency, with one email marked 'High' importance.
